message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $8000.  Would you be willing to come down to $8500?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer. I'm offering the product to you for $9500.
